languages.text: "Если это принесет покой вашему сердцу, шерин, мы так и поступим". {n}Холод аугмента касается вашей ладони, и Джай уводит вас прочь с капитанского мостика.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Если это принесет покой вашему сердцу, шерин, мы так и поступим". {n}Холод аугмента касается вашей ладони, и Джай уводит вас прочь с капитанского мостика.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "If it will bring peace to your heart, shereen, then we most certainly shall." {n}Jae's cold augmented hand slips into yours and she leads you off the command bridge.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Если это принесет покой вашему сердцу, шерин, мы так и поступим". {n}Холод аугмента касается вашей ладони, и Джай уводит вас прочь с капитанского мостика.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "If this brings peace to your heart, shereen, then we most certainly shall." {n}The cold augmentation slips into your palm and Jae takes you away from the command bridge.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “如果这么做可以为你的心带来平静，那我们走吧，亲爱的。”{n}婕伊冰冷的强化手滑入你的手中，领着你离开了舰桥。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If it will bring peace to your heart, shereen, then we most certainly shall." {n}Jae's cold augmented hand slips into yours and she leads you off the command bridge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “如果这么做可以为你的心带来平静，那我们走吧，亲爱的。”{n}婕伊冰冷的强化手滑入你的手中，领着你离开了舰桥。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "If it will bring peace to your heart, shereen, then we most certainly shall." {n}Jae's cold augmented hand slips into yours and she leads you off the command bridge.{/n}

languages.text: «Si eso conseguirá que se calme tu corazón, shereen, eso haremos». {n}La fría mano aumentada de Jae se posa sobre la tuya y te guía lejos del puente de mando.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If it will bring peace to your heart, shereen, then we most certainly shall." {n}Jae's cold augmented hand slips into yours and she leads you off the command bridge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Si eso conseguirá que se calme tu corazón, shereen, eso haremos». {n}La fría mano aumentada de Jae se posa sobre la tuya y te guía lejos del puente de mando.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「それがあんたの心に平和をもたらすのなら、シャリーン、そうしましょう」{n}ジェイの冷たいオーグメントの手があなたの手を握り、司令ブリッジから連れ出す。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If it will bring peace to your heart, shereen, then we most certainly shall." {n}Jae's cold augmented hand slips into yours and she leads you off the command bridge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それがあんたの心に平和をもたらすのなら、シャリーン、そうしましょう」{n}ジェイの冷たいオーグメントの手があなたの手を握り、司令ブリッジから連れ出す。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn es Euch Seelenfrieden bringt, Shereen, dann gewiss." {n}Jaes kalte augmentierte Hand gleitet in deine und sie führt dich von der Kommandobrücke.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If it will bring peace to your heart, shereen, then we most certainly shall." {n}Jae's cold augmented hand slips into yours and she leads you off the command bridge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wenn es Euch Seelenfrieden bringt, Shereen, dann gewiss." {n}Jaes kalte augmentierte Hand gleitet in deine und sie führt dich von der Kommandobrücke.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Si cela peut vous mettre à l'aise, shereen, allons-y. » {n}Jae glisse sa main froide dans la vôtre et vous guide vers la porte de la passerelle.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If it will bring peace to your heart, shereen, then we most certainly shall." {n}Jae's cold augmented hand slips into yours and she leads you off the command bridge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Si cela peut vous mettre à l'aise, shereen, allons-y. » {n}Jae glisse sa main froide dans la vôtre et vous guide vers la porte de la passerelle.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Yüreğine huzur verecekse şirinim, devam edelim." {n}Jae, ogmentli soğuk eliyle elini kavrıyor ve seni çekip komuta köprüsünden götürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If it will bring peace to your heart, shereen, then we most certainly shall." {n}Jae's cold augmented hand slips into yours and she leads you off the command bridge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yüreğine huzur verecekse şirinim, o hâlde yapmamız gereken şey budur." {n}Jae, ogmentli soğuk eliyle elini kavrıyor ve seni komuta köprüsünden çekip götürüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
